abstract: Lawyers for John F Haggerty Jr deny accusations that their client took $1.1 million from Mayor Michael R Bloomberg’s 2009 re-election campaign without delivering services he promised.
snippet: Lawyers for John F. Haggerty Jr. denied accusations that their client took $1.1 million from Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s 2009 re-election campaign without delivering the services he promised.
lead_paragraph: Lawyers for John F. Haggerty Jr. denied accusations that their client took $1.1 million from Mayor Michael R. Bloomberg’s 2009 re-election campaign without delivering the services he promised.

headline.main: After 2 Days, Defense Rests in Bloomberg Consultant’s Trial
headline.print_headline: After 2 Days, Defense Rests in Bloomberg Consultant’s Trial
headline.seo: Haggerty’s Defense Rests in Trial Over Bloomberg Campaign Money
